Changes
=======

1.1.3 2010-05-03
----------------

  - fixed parameter in generated rabbitmqctl script (-sname instead
    of -name)

1.1.2 2010-05-02
----------------

  - fixed parameter in generated rabbitmq-server script (-sname instead
    of -name)

1.1.1 2010-03-21
----------------

  - Fixes an issue where the Erlang path wasn't set correctly.


1.1.0 2010-03-20
----------------

  - Updated for RabbitMQ 1.7.2.


1.0.0 2009-08-23
----------------

  - Initial release.
